game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: Legend has it that a powerful artifact is hidden within the lost temple. Your quest is to retrieve this artifact and bring it back to the village elder.

task.description: The temple is hidden deep in the forest. You must navigate through the dense foliage to reach it.
A rickety ladder leads to the temple's entrance. You must carefully make your way up without falling.
A fierce monster guards the artifact. You must defeat it in combat to claim your prize.
